channel.title: Need NPC scripter and admin scriping and money scriping
channel.description:
I need someone to tell me where to put this and make this npc for me
Santa sellin
Dragon legs 500k dragon plate 500k dragon scimmy 500k Torag hammers 250k Torag plate 200k Torag legs 250k ring of glory 100k any good necklase 400k Party hat BLUE--RED--YELLOW 100mill each
COORDS----3258,3436
and make a a comand so and admin can spawn money
and can you make 500k spawn on both side of dore buy the at the training arrea and spawin money in corner of bank NE
tell me ware to locate please

item.title: Need NPC scripter and admin scriping and money scriping
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!

@Waffles1 wrote:

Creating the npcs…Guessing at a spawn, autospawn.cfg
Santa…Spawn the santa ^
Adding those items, shops.cfg
Making santa connect to that shop, client.java, somewhere under npc click one, or click one npc(idk the piece of code by hear, sorry.)
